thread.title: Small cruise ship great for Greek islands

author: Cindi Ekberg
title: Small cruise ship great for Greek islands
text:
Photo: Courtesy Cindi Ekberg Cindi and Bill Ekberg of Pacifica in Santorini, Greece. Cindi and Bill Ekberg of Pacifica in Santorini, Greece.
Where I went: Several places in Greece: Mykonos, Santorini, Crete, Kythira, Hydra and Athens. Cindi and Bill Ekberg of Pacifica in Santorini, Greece. Cindi and Bill Ekberg of Pacifica in Santorini, Greece.
